about_the_game:
JOIN OUR DISCORD https://discord.gg/qm2mx2cdHh

NOTE: The playtest is currently only playable through Oculus devices and Valve Index.

Playing as a peanut butter and jelly-obsessed professional exterminator, you travel across the world taking care of nasty undead infestations. Make some serious cash to reach your goal of eating as many peanut butter and jelly sandwiches as possible, and down it all with a glass of chocolate milk.

KEY FEATURES:

- Physics-based character, movement, and weapon handling
- 6 fun game modes like Tech Tree, Camp Holdout, Tower Defense, and more
- Dismemberment of zombie heads and arms
- Choose from weapon attachments like scopes, red dots, stocks, and more
- Pick from over 100 Rifles, Carbines, SMGs, Pistols, Revolvers, Rocket Launchers, Grenade Launchers, LMGs, and more
- Peanut butter and jelly spreading mechanics, pick your butter knife and get going!

content_descriptors.notes: Zombies spew blood when hit, heads can be dismembered, and arms can be cut off. There is a red flash when the player is damaged. There is a map that contains many skeletons.

name: Bread or Dead VR Demo
short_description: Playing as a peanut butter and jelly-obsessed professional exterminator, you travel across the world taking care of nasty undead infestations. Make some serious cash to reach your goal of eating as many peanut butter and jelly sandwiches as possible, and down it all with a glass of chocolate milk.
